responses: Hi there, how can I help?

I can give you an explanation consisting of a decision rule, explaining the factual reasons of the decision, and a set of counterfactuals, suggesting the changes in the instance features that would lead to a different outcome! Furthermore, I can Say you the most important feature, bring to you some exemplars, and some counter exemplar to clarify it more!

patterns: How often does the system make mistakes?
In what situations is the system likely to be incorrect?
In what situations is the system likely to be correct?
What are the limitations of the system?
What kind of mistakes is the system likely to make?
Is the system's performance good enough for...
How does the system make this prediction?
why do you give me this explanation?
how is this instance given this prediction?
Why is this instance given this prediction?
What feature(s) of this instance leads to the system's prediction?
Why are instance A and B given the same prediction?
How should this instance change to get a different prediction?
How should this feature change for this instance to get a different prediction?
What kind of instance gets a different prediction?
How does it weigh different features?
Is feature X used or not used for the predictions?
What features does the system consider?
Which are the most important variable(s)?
Does this feature influence on prediction?
what about instances similar to this instance
show me an instance similar to this instance
what about instances that is not similar to this instance
what is the nearest neighbour that is not similar to this instance
